attributes.action: Pay for Private Ambulance Services to help with the effects of COVID-19
attributes.additional_details:
1) Take Pressure of NHS 
2) Still keep Private Ambulance and medical services in business this way will make the most of this resource rather than wasting and damaging health resources. 
3) It’s easier for local ambulance services to work with their local area ; taking strain of NHS; this can include Patient Transport Services, Prescription delivery’s and any other health related issue.
attributes.background: The NHS and Health Care system is under intense pressure ; we need the government to make the most of these fantastic resources , give Private companies contracts to work with the NHS to take the pressure of the NHS staff

departments.name: Department of Health and Social Care
